relating to existentialism (= a system of ideas according to which the world has no meaning and each person is alone and completely responsible for their own actions): From an existentialistic perspective, it is the individual’s responsibility to create meaning. Meaning is central to the existentialistic point of view. Synonym
existentialRelated word
existentialism
More examplesFewer examplesThis work is an existentialistic interpretation of the nature of human existence.He had an existentialistic attitude towards religion.It may be possible to argue that all philosophies are in a sense existentialistic.Existentialistic philosophy emphasizes the importance of individual freedom and responsibility.
